items.sentence: I\'ve lost my umbrella. I have to buy a new one.
If I were you, I wouldn\'t do such a rude thing.
I have a daughter who\'s married to a Frenchman.
I don\'t want to make the same mistake Tom made.
Tom and Mary weren\'t able to help John do that.
Tom bought his mother flowers for Mother\'s Day.
I can\'t believe you\'re not as excited as I am.
I can\'t figure out what\'s causing the problem.
Tom bought a present for his daughter\'s friend.
Tom called Mary and told her that he\'d be late.
I haven\'t met him in person, but I know of him.
I hear he\'s just begun looking for another job.
I hope it won\'t be long before I hear from her.
I left home early so I wouldn\'t miss the train.
Tom is a boy\'s name and Mary is a girl\'s name.
I couldn\'t have done it without you. Thank you.
Everybody is hungry, so let\'s go ahead and eat.
Everybody knew that Tom didn\'t want to be here.
Getting a driver\'s license would make me happy.
Tom is the one who gave me Mary\'s phone number.
